r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n: ### Added - Add \DDTrace\get_current_context #1227 - Create property ZAI seam for PHP 8 #1246 - Create exceptions ZAI seam for PHP 8 #1248 - Run mongodb-driver testsuite in CI with and without the tracer #1255 ### Changed - Move mapping-settings to be deserialized as a zend_array * #1253 ### Fixed - Remove TSRMLS_C from \DDTrace\current_context #1249
